column4: Mazda Motor Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of passenger cars and commercial vehicles in Japan, the United States, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Toyo Kogyo Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Mazda Motor Corporation in May 1984. Mazda Motor Corporation was incorporated in 1920 and is headquartered in Hiroshima, Japan.
